title: Memory leak CUDNN 7003
body_html: I updated pytorch to 0.3 using conda. I realized that there is a memory leak in RAM in my experiments. Later, I tried to compile from source python with CUDNN 6... and 7005, other versions of CUDNN solved the problem. Is it possible to update CUDNN (from 7003 to 7005) in conda/pip packages?
